item.title: Please help me fast!
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

hello i wanna know how i know how case i are need to use… just take a look on this finished code i edited:

ClickingMost.java:

case 28171:
if(c.playerRights >=1) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.setAnimation(3971);
c.refreshSkills();
c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX, c.absY-1, 2213, -1, 10);
c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX, c.absY-2, 2213, -1, 10);
c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX, c.absY-3, 2213, -1, 10);
c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX, c.absY-4, 2213, -1, 10);
c.sM(“You spawned a bank booth!”);
} else
c.sM(“This is only admins, im sorry…”);
break;

TextHandler.java:

if(c.playerRights <= 1) {
c.sendQuest("@red@Bank booth (admin)", 7339);
}
if(c.playerRights >= 1) {
c.sendQuest("@gre@Bank booth", 7339);
}

thats it…

how i find out how case i have to use? and somone got harp key id’s?

-meele
